name: Environment Art
description:
After the passing of your grandfather, he left you some of his belongings. Years later you decided to finally dig through all the boxes that have been catching dust in your attic. Amongst them you find some logbooks, multiple old looking documents and reports about a forest filled with mysteries. Your late grandfather turned out to have been an adventurer in his young days. He never finished his studies and there is still a lot left unknown about the place he speaks about in his logs.

You find yourself in a mysterious and magical forest. The atmosphere is eerie, yet calm. With the help of the old reports and documents you try to uncover the mysteries that lie beyond and finish your grandfather's work.

Controls:

  • WASD : Walk
  • Hold SHIFT : Sprint
  • SPACE : Jump
  • E : Interact
  • Q : View document
